products.name: Queen Size Bed Frame
products.description: A comfortable king size bed with a memory foam mattress. In excellent condition.

products.name: Sofa Set
products.description: A comfortable leather sofa in excellent condition. Comes from a smoke-free home.

products.name: Dining Table with Chairs
products.description: A wooden dining table that seats 6 people. Has some minor scratches, but otherwise in good condition.

products.name: Refrigerator
products.description: A 2-door refrigerator in good condition. Has a few scratches on the outside, but works perfectly.

products.name: Washing Machine
products.description: A front-loading washing machine in good condition. Has some minor dents on the front, but works perfectly.

products.name: Microwave
products.description: A small microwave in good condition. Works perfectly.

products.name: Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: A bagless vacuum cleaner in excellent condition. Comes with a detachable hose and various attachments.

products.name: King Size Mattress
products.description: This king size mattress has been used for a few years but is still in good condition. It is very comfortable and has a pillow-top design.

products.name: Coffee Table
products.description: This coffee table is in good condition and has a unique design with a glass top and metal frame.

products.name: Cuisinart Toaster
products.description: A 2-slice toaster with extra-wide slots and six browning settings. Has a bagel, defrost, and reheat functions.

products.name: Rowenta Steam Iron
products.description: A high-performance steam iron with 400 steam holes and a precision tip for hard-to-reach areas. Has a 12-ounce water tank and auto shut-off feature.

products.name: Vintage Record Player
products.description: This vintage record player is in good condition and works great. It has a unique design with a wood casing and built-in speakers.

products.name: Antique Brass Table Lamp
products.description: This antique brass table lamp is in good condition and would be a great addition to any living room or bedroom. It has a unique design with intricate details.

products.name: Window Air Conditioner
products.description: A 10,000 BTU window air conditioner with three fan speeds and four-way air direction. Has an energy-saving mode and programmable timer.

products.name: Outdoor Patio Set
products.description: This outdoor patio set includes a table and four chairs. It is in good condition and has only been used a few times.

products.name: Samsung 55-Inch 4K UHD Smart TV
products.description: Upgrade your home entertainment with this 55-inch Samsung Smart TV. The 4K UHD resolution delivers sharp visuals and vibrant colors, while the smart TV functionality provides access to streaming services and live television. This Samsung Smart TV has built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity for seamless internet access, and the HDMI and USB ports offer flexible connectivity options.

products.name: Lasko 18-Inch Pedestal Fan
products.description: Keep cool during the hot summer months with this 18-inch Lasko pedestal fan. The adjustable height and tilt let you direct the airflow where you need it, and the three speed settings provide customized comfort. The oscillation feature evenly distributes the air, and the easy-grip rotary control makes it simple to adjust the speed.

products.name: Oven
products.description: A gas-powered oven in excellent condition. Comes with a broiler and a timer.

products.name: Water Heater
products.description: Get reliable hot water with this 50-gallon Rheem Performance Platinum water heater. The tank has a 12-year warranty, and the high efficiency heating elements reduce energy costs. The LED display makes it easy to set the temperature, and the EcoNet WiFi technology lets you monitor the unit and receive alerts remotely.

products.name: Set of Two Blackout Curtains
products.description: Transform your windows with this set of two blackout curtains. The curtains are made from a high-quality, thick fabric that blocks out light and sound. The grommet design makes it easy to hang the curtains, and the elegant style complements any room decor.
